title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-1.4 - Lowest achievable emission rate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 231-1.4 - Lowest achievable emission rate

State Regulations
(a) The emissions from any air contamination
source project subject to this Subpart must meet the lowest achievable emission
rate as defined in Part 200 of this Title. (b) Any source owner subject to this Subpart
must submit information to establish that the lowest achievable emission rate
will be applied when an application is submitted for a permit to
construct. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
231-1.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
